name: Built To Protect
description:
Built To Protect

In this wave-based action game, you play as a teddy bear whose job is to protect Tom (his owner) from the creatures of his nightmares.

You wield a sword made of light which can seriously injure clawed demons and reflect psychic energy emitted from eyeball mutants.

This game has both normal and hard difficulty.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Swing Sword: SpaceBar / Left Mouse Click

Aim Sword: Mouse

Credits : 

Font : https://www.1001fonts.com/setback-tt-brk-font.html

Everything else : https://jackbeterson.itch.io
